results.title: Role of individual and combined impact of simvastatin and alpha-TCP in rat calvarial bone defect: An experimental study
results.text_hl: This study aims to compare a control group of standard critical @DISEASE_Bone_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001847 @@@bone defect@@@ models treated without any bone transplants to critical size calvarial @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasms_Bone_Tissue</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018213 @@@bony defects@@@ treated with various bone replacements, including @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_alpha_tricalcium_phosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C485828 @@@alpha-tricalcium phosphate@@@, while analyzing the healing patterns.

citations.NLM: Sugumaran S, Selvam D, Nivedhitha MS, Ganesh Mohanraj K, Almutairi BO, Arokiyaraj S, Guru A, Arockiaraj J. Role of individual and combined impact of simvastatin and alpha-TCP in rat calvarial bone defect: An experimental study Saudi Dent J. 2023 Nov;35(7):861-868. PMID: 38077229
citations.BibTeX: @article{38077229, title={Role of individual and combined impact of simvastatin and alpha-TCP in rat calvarial bone defect: An experimental study}, author={Sugumaran S and Selvam D and Nivedhitha MS and Ganesh Mohanraj K and Almutairi BO and Arokiyaraj S and Guru A and Arockiaraj J}, journal={Saudi Dent J}, volume={35}, number={7}, pages={861-868}}

results.title: Comparison of simvastatin 1.2% gel and alendronate 1% gel in chronic periodontitis as local drug delivery: A randomized clinical trial
results.text_hl: ...Usage of both @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SMV@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Alendronate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019386 @@@ALN@@@ gels in periodontal intra @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasms_Bone_Tissue</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018213 @@@bony defects@@@ can lead to significant improvements in clinical and radiographic parameters; however, @CHEMICAL_Alendronate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019386 @@@ALN@@@ showed better osseous @DISEASE_Congenital_Abnormalities @DISEASE_MESH:D000013 @@@defect@@@ fill.

citations.NLM: Shetty B, Karegowda P, Khan SF, Yadalam U, Nambiar M. Comparison of simvastatin 1.2% gel and alendronate 1% gel in chronic periodontitis as local drug delivery: A randomized clinical trial J Indian Soc Periodontol. 2022 Nov-Dec;26(6):591-599. PMID: 36582946
citations.BibTeX: @article{36582946, title={Comparison of simvastatin 1.2% gel and alendronate 1% gel in chronic periodontitis as local drug delivery: A randomized clinical trial}, author={Shetty B and Karegowda P and Khan SF and Yadalam U and Nambiar M}, journal={J Indian Soc Periodontol}, volume={26}, number={6}, pages={591-599}}

results.title: The combined anti-osteoporotic effects of simvastatin and exercise in ovariectomized mice fed a high-fat diet.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: The coexistence of @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@ and @DISEASE_Hereditary_Angioedema_Type_III @DISEASE_MESH:D056828 @@@estrogen deficiency@@@ further aggravates @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasms_Bone_Tissue</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018213 @@@bone tissue degeneration@@@ and @DISEASE_Abnormalities_Drug_Induced @DISEASE_MESH:D000014 @@@abnormal@@@ metabolic pathology, which could be better inhibited by the combination with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and exercise instead of single intervention, suggesting that combined intervention may be a potential candidate for amelioration of the progression of @DISEASE_Osteoporosis @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@OP@@@.

citations.NLM: Li H, Gou Y, Tian F, Lian Q, Hu Y, Zhang L. The combined anti-osteoporotic effects of simvastatin and exercise in ovariectomized mice fed a high-fat diet. Exp Gerontol. 2022 Jul;164():111794. PMID: 35421557
citations.BibTeX: @article{35421557, title={The combined anti-osteoporotic effects of simvastatin and exercise in ovariectomized mice fed a high-fat diet.}, author={Li H and Gou Y and Tian F and Lian Q and Hu Y and Zhang L}, journal={Exp Gerontol}, volume={164}, pages={111794}}

results.title: Design and in vitro evaluation of polymeric formulae of simvastatin for local bone induction.
results.text_hl: This study deals with the design and in vitro evaluation of local delivery systems for @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. They are intended to treat @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasms_Bone_Tissue</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018213 @@@bony defects@@@ resulting from @DISEASE_Periodontitis @DISEASE_MESH:D010518 @@@periodontitis@@@ or to induce osteogenesis around the @CHEMICAL_Titanium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014025 @@@titanium@@@ implants.

citations.NLM: Ismail FA. Design and in vitro evaluation of polymeric formulae of simvastatin for local bone induction. Drug Dev Ind Pharm. 2006 Nov-Dec;32(10):1199-206. PMID: 17090442
citations.BibTeX: @article{17090442, title={Design and in vitro evaluation of polymeric formulae of simvastatin for local bone induction.}, author={Ismail FA}, journal={Drug Dev Ind Pharm}, volume={32}, number={10}, pages={1199-206}}

results.title: Local application of statin promotes bone repair through the suppression of osteoclasts and the enhancement of osteoblasts at bone-healing sites in rats.
results.journal: Oral Surg Oral Med Oral Pathol Oral Radiol Endod
results.text_hl: STUDY DESIGN: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ (or a vehicle) was injected into a @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasms_Bone_Tissue</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018213 @@@bony defect@@@ for 3 consecutive days from the day of surgery.

citations.NLM: Ayukawa Y, Yasukawa E, Moriyama Y, Ogino Y, Wada H, Atsuta I, Koyano K. Local application of statin promotes bone repair through the suppression of osteoclasts and the enhancement of osteoblasts at bone-healing sites in rats. Oral Surg Oral Med Oral Pathol Oral Radiol Endod. 2009 Mar;107(3):336-42. PMID: 18801677

results.title: A Randomized Trial Using 3Mixtatin Compared to MTA in Primary Molars with Inflammatory Root Resorption: A Novel Endodontic Biomaterial.
results.text_hl: The aim of this study was to assess the success of the repair of @<m>DISEASE_Neoplasms_Bone_Tissue</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018213 @@@bony defects@@@, caused by pre-treatment perforations, with a mixture of three antibiotics combined with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (3Mixtatin) compared to @CHEMICAL_Pemetrexed @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068437 @@@MTA@@@ in hopeless primary molars.

citations.NLM: Aminabadi NA, Huang B, Samiei M, Agheli S, Jamali Z, Shirazi S. A Randomized Trial Using 3Mixtatin Compared to MTA in Primary Molars with Inflammatory Root Resorption: A Novel Endodontic Biomaterial. J Clin Pediatr Dent. 2016;40(2):95-102. PMID: 26950808
citations.BibTeX: @article{26950808, title={A Randomized Trial Using 3Mixtatin Compared to MTA in Primary Molars with Inflammatory Root Resorption: A Novel Endodontic Biomaterial.}, author={Aminabadi NA and Huang B and Samiei M and Agheli S and Jamali Z and Shirazi S}, journal={J Clin Pediatr Dent}, volume={40}, number={2}, pages={95-102}}
